detailed_goals: Complete data collection for seasonal influenza cases, addressing any discrepancies identified by Quality Assurance Testers.
Conduct first round of data analysis on collected data to identify trends.
Present preliminary findings in a structured meeting format for feedback.
Collaborate with Data Analysts to ensure EHR data collection processes are aligned with project goals.
Facilitate communication between team members regarding EHR performance and challenges.
Oversee the data collection process and ensure that protocols for seasonal influenza data are being followed.
Collaborate with data analysts to validate the accuracy of the collected data.
Enhance testing protocols based on previous feedback and conduct QA checks on the accuracy of influenza data entries.
Prepare a status report for the team highlighting QA findings and any potential data discrepancies.
Provide feedback on EHR data entry processes used for influenza cases, identifying any challenges faced during documentation.
Participate in training sessions to ensure correct usage of EHR tools.
Work on improving integration solutions to support effective data documentation.
Assess current EHR features for usability and effectiveness in documenting seasonal influenza cases.
Coordinate weekly goals discussion among team members focusing on data analysis and collection processes.
Ensure all roles are aligned with upcoming tasks and address any collaboration challenges.
Ensure that database integrity is maintained during the influenza data collection period.
Assist in troubleshooting any database-related issues that arise during data integration efforts.
Collaborate with the Clinical Lead to ensure proper data collection methodologies are being adhered to.
Conduct trend analysis based on the data collected for seasonal influenza.
Conduct ongoing training sessions for healthcare staff regarding the use of EHR for influenza data entry.
Gather feedback from training participants to improve future training materials.
Execute further rounds of QA checks on the influenza data entries focusing on reliability.
Summarize findings and prepare for team presentations.
Engage in data entry for seasonal influenza cases in the EHR, ensuring accuracy in documentation.
Report any issues related to the data collection process to the Clinical Lead.
Support integration of user feedback to enhance EHR functionality.
Collaborate with QA testers to address any technical challenges encountered.
Assist in documenting seasonal influenza cases accurately in the EHR.
Participate in training sessions to further enhance understanding of the EHR system.
Analyze support tickets related to EHR data input for influenza and identify common issues.
Update training materials and support documentation based on findings from support interactions.
Advocate for improvements in EHR functionalities based on integration needs from various roles.
Support ongoing training and education efforts to ensure effective data documentation.
Ensure the integrity of medical records during the data collection phase.
Collaborate with Data Analysts to resolve any discrepancies found in the documentation.
Lead discussions on improving documentation practices related to influenza cases recorded in the EHR.
Facilitate communication between clinical staff and data analysts for optimal data collection strategies.
Assist in maintaining accurate medical records during data entry processes.
Liaise with Data Analysts to verify the accuracy of influenza-related documentation.
Evaluate current EHR technologies to address usability concerns raised by clinical staff.
Contribute to the implementation of training sessions focused on improving data entry for influenza cases.
